text:
Hi!
I'm writing a custom card.
I want to show on a text the value of a pipeline stage. With this code value is not returned
```<Text>{ticket.hs_pipeline_stage?.label || "N/A"}</Text>```
Any ideas?
Hi, if you need the pipeline label you can retrieve that from the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/pipelines|pipeline API> along with other details.

I'm building a UIE and wanted to create a contact and set the owner to the ID of the logged in user. As <@U01QVR44MEY> so graciously pointed out, context.user.id is actually the logged in USER ID, which is different from the logged in user's OWNER ID. For now I'm going to have to hit the API to convert the user id to an owner id but could we consider adding that to the context user object?
That's on my list of annoying things when creating cards as well as converting all the dates and datetimes
dates and datetimes are definitely the more annoying thing
